Mantenimiento Web | Jose Carlos Román Ru: Web maintenance | Jose Carlos Román Rubio
Mantenimiento Web. ¿En qué consiste y po: Web maintenance. Why is so important? What does it cost? Why should you hire a professional? If you have a website, you will be interested in reading this article
El mantenimiento de tu página o aplicaci: You might be wondering: What's all the fuss about maintaining websites? I have my website and it's working. Why should I spend more money on something that I've already paid?
<strong>¿Qué pasa si no la mantienes?</s: Ok, I see your point. I'll tell you why you should maintain your website: Same reason that you maintain your car, your house or whatever it's important to you. Do you also care about your website?
Al final siempre va a fallar algo. Es co: Believe me, like everything listed above, websites also break. They might either stop working suddenly, either display errors, either get attacked if they are not updated. There a lot of ways websites can fail if you don't take care about them.
<strong>He visto muchas páginas Webs que: As a developer I've seen lots of websites failing because they were abandoned. Some owners think that once they are built they are going to be up and running.
El mantenimiento debe llevarlo un profes: It should be done by a professional. If you have hired a web developer ask them about the mainteinance since they will know better than anyone else how your website has been developed.
De hecho dentro del desarrollo Web no en: Web maintenance is actually a part of the software development process.
<strong>En el caso de que no te ofrezcan: If you already have a website, I recommend you contact a professional.
Cada Web es diferente y por lo tanto <sp: Every website is different and so are the maintenance tasks. However the goal is the same independent of the website complexity: The website must be up and runnig as it was when it was built.
Podemos decir entonces que el profesiona: The main tasks are focused to achieve this goal. The professional must be in charge of updating and protecting the website, as well as fixing errors and related tasks.
Esas son las tareas que el cliente \"no: Apart from these main tasks the client may need the professional to help them out. Which tasks must the professional perform and which not?
<strong>El freelancer o la empresa que s: The professional are in charge of having the website up and running, they work on what already exists, thw roek on the content, but they don't have the obligation of adding new features.
Puedes pedirle al profesional que te cam: For example, you might want the professional to help you out to change any content, also you can need help for fixing any errors.
No puedes pedirle que te convierta una p: On the other hand you can't ask the professional to convert your showcase website into a online store. You will have to request a quote since you are asking for a new feature.
De nuevo, depende de la página o aplicac: Well, again, it depends on the Web complexity. The important key here is to pay a fixed price per month, that way the professional will work when needed. Hourly contracts might be very risky in this scenario, the professional might need more hours than expected to complete the maintenance tasks.
<span class=\"highlighted\">Entre los se: You can find in my website Web maintenance services for ONLY 30 euros. I usually charge my clients between 50 and 100 euros (price per website), which are very competitive rates.
Como siempre te atenderé encantado y me: I will respond all your enquiries as soon as I can. Thank you in advance.
El mantenimiento de tu Web desde tan sol: Get your website maintained from only 30 euros per month.
